name: flash
effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Looses a powerful blast of light that cuts accuracy.
flavor_text.emerald: Looses a powerful blast of light that cuts accuracy.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A blast of light that cuts the foe’s accuracy. It also illuminates caves.
